Title: Orruk Warboss on Wyvern
Intro: An Orruk Warboss on Wyvern is armed with one of the following weapon options: Boss Choppa and Boss Shield; or two Boss Choppas.

Rules.Name: Shield
Rules.Rule: SHIELD: If this unit is armed with a Boss Choppa and Boss Shield, it has a Save characteristic of 3+ instead of 4+.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unitâ€™s Wyvern is armed with Horns, Claws and Teeth, and a Venomous Barbed Tail.

Rules.Name: Agonising Venom
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Venomous Barbed Tail is 6, the target suffers 3 mortal wounds and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
